title: libert19
author: libert19
content: Today, Zora unveiled on mirror that you can post on their platform without having any eth whatsoever. I consider it a big deal cause requiring money to enter kinda gatekeeps the platform. Mirror post: https://zora.mirror.xyz/LTBHZHk9zAQiK4n-CxPi_g_PjQ8jjGnArfZ_UJz0ILMPost: http://zora.co/createSince this doesn't cost anything, it may be wise to give it a try, just upload something!

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: We have learned from so many old cases that if the platform like zora might put bridge to the its platform as one of main requirement to be eligible for airdrop. You're right if anyone may be able to post it without bridged their ethereum but will it also affect our eligibility? I meant the user who bridged ethereum may have a greater chance to be qualified for airdrop from zora in the future. This is a good once but i kinda feel that bridging to the zora is a must make sure our wallet address to be whitelisted once snapshoot will happen but thanks for this post. It seems like that there may be another metrics to be used once zora will launch its token.
